document_data.name: ''Portrait of Gortash''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Portrait of Gortash''''' was a unique painting of the one-time [[Grand Duke]] Lord [[Enver Gortash]], created in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] by an unknown painter.
document_data.Description: The portrait was an image of Lord Enver Gortash in his younger years. He appeared to stand tall in his fine [[robe]]s, holding a cane, looking devilishly dashing. The painting's frame was lovingly polished.
document_data.History: The ''Portrait of Gortash'' was "proudly" displayed by Enver Gortash's parents, [[Sally Flymm|Sally]] and [[Dravo Flymm]], being hung over the counter in their humble [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] shop, [[Flymm's Cobblers]], in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
